narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Gold Cross Services Inc. is a Ambulance  Land Transport provider based in Salt Lake City, UT. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $92.5M in Medicaid payments across 514K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $92.5M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
